title: Online Science Learning Outcome Assessment Model Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: A science learning course in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, focusing on developing a comprehensive assessment model for learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% performance proficiency in each step by simulating scientific experiment processes in an online microlearning environment.
Learners can diagnose their science concept understanding level in three stages (concrete-abstract-application) using a FANP-based assessment tool.
Learners improve science problem-solving strategies two or more times based on personalized feedback provided by a recommendation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
